lang.label: Language
footer.tagline: Premium extra vergine olive oil from Italy farms.
hero.title: Flavor born from soil and sun.
hero.lead: We select small batches of extra virgin olive oil so every drop carries notes of herbs and ripe olives.
hero.imgAlt: Olive oil in a glass bottle
features.title: Why choose us
features.lead: Control from tree to bottle, transparent origin, and selected olive varieties.
features.card1.title: Cold pressed
features.card1.body: Extraction stays below 27C to preserve antioxidants and aroma.
features.card2.title: Seasonal micro-batches
features.card2.body: Each batch has a unique flavor profile and traceable lot number.
features.card3.title: Premium bottle
features.card3.body: Dark glass protects from light, and the pourer controls dosage.
approach.title: Olive selection from the first harvest.
approach.lead: We practice hand work picking and immediate milling to prevent oxidation. Each variety is tasted by olive oil sommeliers.
collection.title: Season collection
collection.lead: Three distinct flavor profiles for cooking, tastings, and gifts.
collection.item1.title: Cuvee Verde
collection.item1.body: Fresh and herbaceous, perfect for salads.
collection.item2.title: Gold Harvest
collection.item2.body: Soft almond finish for pasta and vegetables.
collection.item3.title: Noire Reserve
collection.item3.body: Deep, spicy profile for meat and grill.
cta.title: Need a tasting for a restaurant or shop?
cta.body: We will curate the line, arrange a tasting.
aboutHero.title: We build a culture of real olive oil appreciation.
aboutHero.lead: Olio Del Nonno is a team of tasters, farmers, and culinary advisors. We travel the Mediterranean, look for bold character olives, and preserve their story in every bottle.
philosophy.title: Craft-first philosophy
philosophy.body: We do not chase mass production. Instead, we create limited batches where we knows the harvest and we know the flavor profile. Every batch has a certificate of origin and a transparent story.
timeline.title: Our journey
timeline.lead: Each milestone is daily work and care for quality.
timeline.item1.title: First partnerships
timeline.item1.body: We found family farms in Italy that agreed to full transparency.
timeline.item2.title: Our own lab
timeline.item2.body: We launched lab control for acidity and polyphenols to validate the profile.
timeline.item3.title: Educational tastings
timeline.item3.body: We started public tastings and workshops for restaurants and private clients.
timeline.item4.title: New collection
timeline.item4.body: We released a line of three flavor profiles developed with chefs.
values.title: Our values
values.item1: Respect for traditions and the people who grow olives.
values.item4: Education mission to teach proper tasting.
productsHero.title: Olive oil with distinct flavor profiles for different dishes.
productsHero.lead: We created a line with different levels of bitterness and spice so you can match an oil to your cooking style.
products.item1.title: Cuvee Verde
products.item1.body: Koroneiki from early harvest. Notes of herbs, green apple peel, and fresh almond.
products.item2.title: Gold Harvest
products.item2.body: Arbequina and Leccino blend for a silky texture. Soft sweetness and ripe nut finish.
products.item2.li2: Best for: pasta, vegetables, light sauces
products.item3.title: Noire Reserve
products.item3.body: Late harvest from Andalusia. Spicy notes of black pepper, artichoke, and bitter cacao.
products.item3.li2: Best for: grill, meat, rich soups
formats.title: Ways we work
formats.body: We partner with retail, HoReCa, and corporate gifting. We select the volume and can brand the label.
contactsHero.title: Write to us - we will match the oil and arrange a tasting.
contactsHero.lead: Fill out the form or reach us by phone. We reply within one business day.
contactsInfo.title: Our contacts
visit.title: Farm visit
visit.body: We prepared a space for intimate tastings. Book a visit, and we will guide you through every step of oil selection.
